encrypt.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to protect information by putting it into a special code that only some people can read, especially information that is on a computer
encrypt.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to write information in the form of CODE, especially to prevent certain people from being able to use it
encrypt.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The program encrypts your password when you use the software for the first time.
